My Most Excellent Sá Brito, in the attached letter that Your Lordship Your Excellency Your Excellency Your Excellency of Your Excellency Almeida Piratini, January 19, 1839.

I send the Manifesto. Regarding Maia's request, I suppose it to be the case, but Your Excellency Sá Brito has not read it as he is arranging travel. B. G. Silva.
